==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|たい|せん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From [[大]] meaning "big" or "great" and from [[戦]] meaning "battle".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たいせん}}

# a [[great]] [[war]], a great [[battle]]
